songs.title: You Took It All
songs.lyrics:
© Universal Music Publishing Group, Sony/ATV Music Publishing LLC, BMG Rights Management / Magnus August Hoiberg / Benjamin Levin / Sia Furler

[Instrumental]

Ohhhh
[Hook]
Like a waterfall
Like a waterfall
A waterfall
You took it all-alllll
You took my love
And now I'm crying

Like a waterfall
Like a waterfall
A waterfall
You took it all-alllll
You took my love
And now I'm crying

[Instrumental]

Like a waterfall
Like a waterfall
A waterfall
You took it all-alllll
You took my love
And now I'm crying

Like a waterfall
Like a waterfall
A waterfall
You took it all-alllll
You took my love
And now I'm crying

Like a waterfall
Like a waterfall
A waterfall

And now I'm crying
[fade out]
